name: Pavillion
description: A large, decorative tent or structure for gatherings; adventurers can attend festivals, meet dignitaries, or uncover secret meetings.
atmosphere: The pavilion has an elegant, festive atmosphere with the scent of fine fabrics and the sound of social gatherings and celebrations. The air carries the promise of important events and the essential nature of communal celebration, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of social connection and the excitement of special occasions.
